content.body: Noam Rosenthal: I don't get the impression he feels strongly about it. One point that was raised is that `moveBefore()` won't be state-preserving for accessibility as layout will be impacted.
content.formatted_body: Noam Rosenthal: I don't get the impression he feels strongly about it. One point that was raised is that moveBefore() won't be state-preserving for accessibility as layout will be impacted.

content.body:
> <@annevk:matrix.org> Noam Rosenthal: I don't get the impression he feels strongly about it. One point that was raised is that `moveBefore()` won't be state-preserving for accessibility as layout will be impacted.

I don’t exactly understand the a11y thing. Changing style can affect layout regardless of DOM structure changes

content.body: Re firing the events - sounds good, let’s start without like we said at WHATNOT and we can revise based on community feedback.
